HiddenText.Name: Wellness Area Director
HiddenText.BodyCopy:
Wellness Area Director

A Student Area Director oversees an entire area of Activities. Student Area Directors are primarily responsible for teaching, training, and empowering the Student Directors in their area. They also meet with other Student Area Directors to counsel about Activities-wide issues.

The Wellness Are Director directs, teaches, trains, counsels, and provides vision. They interview, select, train and hold Directors accountable.

General Responsibilities

Set up and direct weekly council meetings with Directors ( approx.. 1 hr)
Counsel regularly with student directors and advisor
Counsel weekly with other Student Area Directors
Invite individuals to participate in the program.

There is a time commitment of 10+ hours per week.

The application deadline is 5:00 p.m. on the 7th Friday prior to the previous semester's end.
